histogram.name: WebAuthentication.Android.CredManAvailability
histogram.summary: Records whether Android Credential Management service is available. Recorded only for Android 14+, after the first passkey request on the profile.

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.Android.CredManConditionalRequest
histogram.summary: Records events for Android Credential Management getCredential API for conditional UI requests.

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.Android.CredManCreateRequest
histogram.summary: Records events for Android Credential Management createCredential API for modal requests.

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.Android.CredManModalRequests
histogram.summary: Records events for Android Credential Management getCredential API for modal requests.

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.Android.CredManPrepareRequest
histogram.summary: Records events for Android Credential Management prepareGetCredential API.

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.Android.CredManPrepareRequestDuration
histogram.summary: Records the duration of Android Credential Management prepareGetCredential API.

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.Android.GmsCoreGetCredentialsResult
histogram.summary: Records the result of getting credentials from GMSCore. This can either use the passkey cache service or the FIDO2 APIs.

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.Android.NonDiscoverableCredentialsFound
histogram.summary: Records whether non-discoverable credentials are found before dispatching the request to Android Credential Manager APIs. Recorded only on Android 14 and above.

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.AutomaticPasskeyUpgrade.Result
histogram.summary: Records the outcome of a WebAuthn conditional create (aka automatic passkey upgrade) request on Desktop, including a breakdown of failure conditions.

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.CableV2.TunnelEvent
histogram.summary: Records events that occur during the creation of a caBLEv2 tunnel.

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.CableV2.TunnelServerError
histogram.summary: Records network and HTTP errors when a tunnel server connection fails. (The HTTP error takes precedence if it's available.)

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.ChromeOS.GetAssertionStatus
histogram.summary: Records the outcome of GetAssertion on Chrome OS.

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.ChromeOS.MakeCredentialStatus
histogram.summary: Records the outcome of MakeCredential on Chrome OS.

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.ChromeOS.StartupRecordCount
histogram.summary: Records the number of records of the user's WebAuthn credentials created on Chrome OS.

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.ConditionalUiPasskeyCount
histogram.summary: Records the number of passkeys available for a Conditional UI get request.

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.CredentialFetchDuration.GmsCore.{Source}
histogram.summary: The duration of a request to obtain a list of credentials for a WebAuthn conditional UI Get Assertion request from GMS Core, broken down by the source of the credentials. This is only recorded when at least one credential is available in the results. This is a sub-histogram of WebAuthentication.CredentialFetchDuration.GmsCore and {Source}.

variant.name: Cache
variant.summary: Credentials were fetched from the passkey cache service.

variant.name: CacheFallback
variant.summary: Credentials were fetched from the FIDO2 API after the passkey cache service failed.

variant.name: Fido2
variant.summary: Credentials were fetched from the FIDO2 API directly.

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.CredentialFetchDuration.{ApiUsed}
histogram.summary: The duration of a request to obtain a list of credentials for a WebAuthn conditional UI Get Assertion request, when using the {ApiUsed}. This is only recorded when at least one credential is available in the results. This complements the duration recorded by WebAuthentication.Android.CredManPrepareRequestDuration, which only applies to the CredMan API but emits on all requests including when there are no results present.

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.Enclave.ChangePinEvents
histogram.summary: Records events related to the GPM PIN Change flow. Recorded after when the user clicks on "Change (Google) Password Manager PIN" in password manager settings or when the user clicks "Forgot PIN" in the GPM PIN dialog.

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.EnclaveEvent
histogram.summary: Records events related to the enclave (i.e. Google Password Manager passkeys on the desktop).

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.EnclaveLoadDuration
histogram.summary: Records the time duration that was taken for the Enclave state to load.

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.EnclaveRequestResult.{RequestType}
histogram.summary: Records the result when the Enclave Authenticator client receives a response from the service for a {RequestType} request.

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.EnclaveTransactionResult
histogram.summary: Records when a transaction with the enclave is completed. This records the result of the overall transaction; the success or failure of individual requests within the transaction are not recorded here. This does not record failures due to client-side errors. It does record for errors received from the service, invalid responses from the service, or success.

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.GetAssertion.Immediate.EnclaveReady
histogram.summary: Records whether the enclave was ready to handle an immediate get assertion request. Recorded when an immediate get assertion request is triggered and the user has passkeys from the enclave authenticator.

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.GetAssertion.Immediate.RejectionReason
histogram.summary: Records the reason why a WebAuthn get() request with immediate mediation was rejected by the browser before showing any UI.

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.GetAssertion.Immediate.TimeoutWhileWaitingForUi
histogram.summary: Records whether the immediate timeout occurred while waiting for UI to be shown. Recorded when an immediate get() request is made.

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.GetAssertion.Result
histogram.summary: Records the result of a get assertion request.

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.GetAssertionRequestTransport
histogram.summary: Records the transport used for all WebAuthentication GetAssertion requests sent to authenticators. This does not necessarily mean that there was a success response from any given authenticator.

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.GetAssertionResponseTransport
histogram.summary: Records the transport used when an authenticator responds with success to a WebAuthentication GetAssertion request.

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.GetCredentials.Immediate.CombinedSelectorActions
histogram.summary: Records events related to the combined selector sheet. Recorded for a navigator.credentials.get() call with mediation = "conditional" and when the combined selector is shown.

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.GetCredentials.Immediate.CredentialCount
histogram.summary: Records the number of credentials displayed in the combined selector sheet. Recorded for a navigator.credentials.get() call with mediation = "immediate" and when the combined selector is shown.

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.GPM.GetAssertion
histogram.summary: Records start, success, and failure events for Google Password Manager (GPM) passkey authentication attempts (GetAssertion calls). Each event is emitted immediately after it occurs. See GPMGetAssertionEvents enum for details.

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.GPM.GetAssertion.LargeBlobSucceeded.{Operation}
histogram.summary: Records whether a Large Blob {Operation} operation succeeded during a successful WebAuthn getAssertion request that used the Enclave authenticator (Google Password Manager).

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.GPM.MakeCredential
histogram.summary: Records start, success, and failure events for Google Password Manager (GPM) passkey creation attempts (MakeCredential calls). Each event is emitted immediately after it occurs. See GPMMakeCredentialEvents enum for details.

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.GPM.RecoveryEvent
histogram.summary: Records the type of the key retrieval flow used for retrieving the passkey secret.

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.IOS.ContentAreaEvent
histogram.summary: Logs WebAuthn API interactions in the content area in Chrome on iOS, such as a site requesting passkeys, or an assertion being returned by a CPE. Note that this is *not* limited to passkeys stored in Chrome. Requests handled by any (or no) credential provider are counted here, as well as requests for other types of WebAuthn credentials (e.g. security key credentials).

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.IsUVPlatformAuthenticatorAvailable2
histogram.summary: Records the result of each Web Authentication PublicKeyCredential.isUserVerifyingPlatformAuthenticatorAvailable() API call.

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.MacOS.GetAssertion.LargeBlobSucceeded.{Operation}
histogram.summary: Records whether a Large Blob {Operation} operation succeeded during a WebAuthn getAssertion request on MacOS, using iCloud Keychain.

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.MacOS.MakeCredentialLargeBlobResult
histogram.summary: Records if the macOS platform reported large blob support upon request when a passkey was created via WebAuthn makeCredential (iCloud Keychain).

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.MacOS.PasskeyPermission
histogram.summary: Records whether Chromium is granted the macOS passkeys permission by users when they're prompted for it.

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.MacOS.PlatformAuthenticatorAction
histogram.summary: Records events from the macOS platform authenticator. Note that "success" events are only recorded for transactions that previously recorded a "start" event.

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.MakeCredential.Result
histogram.summary: Records the result of a make credential request.

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.MakeCredentialResponseTransport
histogram.summary: Records the transport used when an authenticator responds with success to a WebAuthentication MakeCredential request.

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.MechanismSorter.DeduplicationHappened
histogram.summary: For a given WebAuthn request, records whether any credentials for the same account were deduplicated. This is recorded for get requests with immediate mediation.

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.MechanismSorter.SelectedMechanismType
histogram.summary: Records the type of the credential that was selected for an account after deduplication. This is recorded for each account that had more than one credential (i.e. when deduplication happened). This is recorded for get requests with immediate mediation.

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.OnboardingEvents
histogram.summary: Recorded when the user interacts with modals in the GPM onboarding flow.

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.PasskeyCount
histogram.summary: Records the number of passkeys stored in Google Password Manager. Recorded on desktop, 30s after Chrome startup.

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.PasskeyReadiness
histogram.summary: Records the readiness state of passkeys stored in Google Password Manager. Tracks if Chrome clients are in a passkey ready state. Passkey ready state means that the client is able to create and store new passkeys and is able to use existing passkeys for signing in. Recorded on desktop, on Chrome startup when enclave manager is loaded.

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.PasskeyUnlock.ErrorUi.Event
histogram.summary: Records all the events related to the passkey unlock error UI, such as when the error UI is shown, hidden or when the user interacts with it. Recorded on desktop.

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.PinRenewalEvent
histogram.summary: Records events related to GPM PIN renewals

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.PinRenewalFailureCause
histogram.summary: Records the reason why a GPM PIN renewal attempt failed. (See the "Renewal failed" case in "WebAuthentication.PinRenewalEvent".)

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.SignalAllAcceptedCredentialsRemovedGPMPasskey
histogram.summary: Records the result of a website calling PublicKeyCredential.signalAllAcceptedCredentials with respect to Google Password Manager passkeys.

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.SignalCurrentUserDetailsUpdatedGPMPasskey
histogram.summary: Records the result of a website calling PublicKeyCredential.signalCurrentUserDetails with respect to Google Password Manager passkeys.

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.SignalUnknownCredentialRemovedGPMPasskey
histogram.summary: Records the result of a website calling PublicKeyCredential.signalUnknownCredential with respect to Google Password Manager passkeys.

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.U2fSignOperation
histogram.summary: Records the result of a WebAuthn get assertion operation on a U2F device. This will be logged every time there's a U2F device plugged in, even if the user did not interact with it.

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.Windows.FindHelloDialogIterationCount
histogram.summary: Records the number of iterations that it took to find the Windows Hello dialog for the purpose of bringing it to the foreground. This dialog is the user verification for using or creating a KeyCredential signing key.

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.Windows.ForegroundedWindowsHelloDialog
histogram.summary: Records the success or failure of attempts to bring the Windows Hello user verification dialog to the foreground during a GPM passkey UV operation, using or creating a KeyCredential signing key.

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.Windows.KeyCredentialCreation
histogram.summary: Records the result of the KeyCredentialManager.RequestCreateAsync method in the Windows Runtime API. It is recorded when that method is called, which currently only happens following a device registration with the GPM passkey enclave service.

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.Windows.KeyCredentialManagerSupported
histogram.summary: Records the result of the KeyCredentialManager.IsSupportedAsync method in the Windows Runtime API. It is recorded on a low-priority thread at browser startup.

histogram.name: WebAuthentication.Windows.KeyCredentialSign
histogram.summary: Records the result of the KeyCredential.RequestSignAsync method in the Windows Runtime API. It is recorded when that method is called, which currently only happens when signing a UV passkey request for the GPM passkey enclave service.
